definitions.text: all the people living at the same time or of approximately the same age
group of genetically related organisms constituting a single step in the line of descent
the normal time between successive generations
examples: they had to wait a generation for that prejudice to fade

definitions.text: a stage of technological development or innovation
the production of heat or electricity
examples: dams were built for the generation of electricity

definitions.text: the act of producing offspring or multiplying by such production
